attributes.description:
Seller Comments
All cars are mechanically checked and Dekra certified. Test Drives are available and welcome subject to availability. Nationwide deliveries can be arranged. We buy and will trade-in your car. On floor finance and insurance manager (NCA & FSB approved). Balance of factory warranty and/or comprehensive warranties available. Balance of motorplan on vehicles which qualify. Finance available through the majority of the financial institutions. With over 65 years of managerial retail experience, we are here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 5 630.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 31 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
